messages.title: A record of service... A promise of more.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver Brexit and continue work on key local issues
More investment for our medical facilities

issues.health: More investment for our medical facilities

community.content: Faster broadband, more investment for our medical facilities and better school buses

leaflet.personalStatement: It’s been an honour to represent Tonbridge, Edenbridge and Malling as your MP since 2015. I’m asking for your support on Thursday 12 December to deliver Brexit, and continue to work on the key local issues.

endorsements.endorsement: From the very start of our campaign, Tom has really helped our family, and especially Tony’s journey. He introduced Tony’s Law to Parliament calling for longer sentences for child cruelty offences. I’m hugely grateful for the support he has given us.
Tom was kind enough to mention my father in his maiden speech and has been actively involved with our local Brittle Bone Society group giving us both his time and unwavering support.
I know Tom cares deeply about local issues and has worked hard with local councillors to support road safety schemes outside our local schools.

The advice that Tom has provided throughout our campaign has been exceptional. He has kindly taken our concerns to the very top of Government and has consistently listened and supported our objectives, enabling us to amplify our voice throughout the community.

quotes.text: Faster broadband, more investment for our medical facilities and better school buses are things I’ve delivered for our towns and villages because I always put the needs of our community and country first.

examples: It’s been an honour to represent Tonbridge, Edenbridge and Malling as your MP since 2015.
